data.title: Business Locations
data.meta_description: With more than 100 offices in the United States, Europe and Asia, Baird serves as a trusted financial partner to individuals, corporations and institutions around the world.
data.text:
BAIRD TRUST

With more than 35 years of experience providing asset management, trust administration and estate settlement services for individuals, families and institutional clients, the professionals at Baird Trust (formally known as Hilliard Lyons Trust) can help clients protect, grow and transfer their wealth in a way that reflects their values and vision for the future. Headquartered in Louisville, we are one of the largest state-chartered trust companies in the commonwealth of Kentucky with more than $20 billion in assets and 100 associates in offices in Indiana, Kentucky, Ohio, Tennessee, and Wisconsin.

EQUITY CAPITAL MARKETS

Research, Global EquityTrading, and Investment Banking compose our Equity Capital Markets business. In addition to offices in key U.S. cities, Baird has an Institutional Sales team in London serving European investors and has Investment Bankers in the UK and Germany who work seamlessly with our U.S. team.

Offices are located in:
